title: Shattered Rose
description:
Being strong wasn't supposed to be a crime.But in Ravenshaw Academy, once you were the target of taunts, jibes and plain cruelty, you were expected to wither away and endure it all.Unfortunately for me, I didn't conform to these unspoken rules. And now I have to pay the price. Because Adrienne, Elijah and Jessica have their own plans for me - ones that surpassed my expectations, ones that are meant to really and truly destroy me.But of course I foolishly fight back...
TRIGGER Shattered Rose is the second book in the Ravenshaw Academy series. It contains mature themes, sexual content, and violence. It touches on topics like rape and abuse. You have been warned!
author: Iris Taylor
